channel.title: Getting food? lol can you please help?
channel.description: Ok, so I got a PK box and I want to make like a crate or something give me like 5 noted manta rays whenever you click it. How can I do this? Lol.

item.title: Getting food? lol can you please help?
item.dc:creator: @508_Client 508_Client
item.description:
@508_Client wrote:

X Screech X:

So I just put any ID I want?

Yeah basically any object that can have actions done to it.
E.G, crate, box.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting food? lol can you please help?

item.title: Getting food? lol can you please help?
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

the case number is the id of the object you want to give food. and if you don’t want people massing add an action timer in there:P

Read full topic
item.source: Getting food? lol can you please help?

item.title: Getting food? lol can you please help?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:2, topic:232501”]Find the ID of the object, then add a case using it;
E.G;

case (object ID here): addItem(392, 5); sendMessage("You receive 5 noted manta rays."); break;
U c naw?[/quote]
L2Read lulz.

Read full topic
